value.name: Love Live! School Idol Project
value.original_name: ラブライブ! School idol project
value.overview: Otonokizaka High School is planning to close within three years. However, nine female students come together with one thing in mind—form a pop idol group to revive the school’s popularity and keep it from shutting down. 'In order to protect our beloved school, there’s only one thing we can do...become pop stars!'
